response.overview: Billie, the stagehand at a local comedy club, dreams of becoming the next big name in comedy but doesn't have the confidence to go on stage. Until one night, she meets her comic idol, Larry DJ, a clean comic with a dark personality. But when a plea for affirmation transforms into unwanted sexual advances, she's forced to make a decision, stand up for herself or walk away.
response.title: The Comedian
